42edd705-de9a-4708-8e7e-0cd748d42fd8.description: The earner of this badge has been nominated by peers in Crop Science Finance and recognized for his/her great contribution / leadership related an important project implemented in his/her area.
42edd705-de9a-4708-8e7e-0cd748d42fd8.name: Make the Difference

badge_template_activities.title: Project contribution / leadership in the Finance Community in Latam.
Skills: Play to win; Innovate and experiment; Be accountable; Create value with the customer.

d1f89806-7435-461d-b088-0f8e5de7bf23.description: The earner of this badge has been a winner in the CS Finance Awards Latam 2021 in the category of projects or people. The CS Finance Community in Latam recognized his/her strong contribution which has been exhibited continuously at work during this year 2021.
d1f89806-7435-461d-b088-0f8e5de7bf23.name: CS Finance Awards Latam 2021

badge_template_activities.title: Inclusion & Diversity: Promotes and creates an environment among employees where each person can contribute and feel valued by being different from one another. Integrate individualities in pursuit of common goals. It promotes equal opportunities. Work in a collaborative way without distinction by gender, religion or others. Create an environment of trust and collaboration.

Cross Collaboration: Build alliances and work collaboratively with others to achieve common goals. It promotes collaboration between the various areas of the organization and the different countries. Facilitate an open dialogue with various contributors. Create a balance between your own interest and that of others. Promotes high visibility of shared contributions for goal achievement.

Always Positive / Driving Changes: It is positively energized when facing ambiguity and uncertainty, maintaining calm and composure in these situations. He/she knows how to handle risks and get ahead in situations of uncertainty. Adapts quickly to change. Maintains a positive attitude and knows how to transmit it to other collaborators, helping to achieve objectives in adverse situations. Face difficult situations with optimism and confidence.

Digital Mindset: Uses Data Analytics and other digital tools to provide insights to support better decision making. ◆ Seeks opportunities to leverage Data and Technology to deliver performance improvements. ◆ Constantly seeks opportunities to increase the digital acumen and promote the business

Customer Centricity: Project that generate value for our customers. Anticipates and has clarity around customer needs taking into account the big picture and thinking strategically. ◆ Co-creates customer-centric solutions driving innovation. ◆ Builds sustainable relationships with our customers (internal and external).

f1e8922e-f673-4c3d-95f9-a1594f3ce525.description: The earner of this badge has been a winner in the CS Finance Awards Latam 2022 in the category of projects or people. The CS Finance Community in Latam recognized his/her strong contribution which has been exhibited continuously at work during this year 2022. Congratulations!
f1e8922e-f673-4c3d-95f9-a1594f3ce525.name: CS LATAM Finance Awards 2022

badge_template_activities.title: In the CS Finance Awards Latam 2022 we recognized following categories in terms of project : Perform (business growth), Transform (simplification & digitalization) & Customer focus. Furthermore, in the CS Finance Awards Latam 2022 we have selected following category in terms of people recognition : Lead with purpose, Be Lean & Fast, Build trust & be inclusive, Create value with customers.

acf3f23c-8508-41bf-97e0-3a6b7c9e0d02.description: The earner of this badge has been nominated by peers in Crop Science Finance and recognized for his/her efficiency which has been exhibited continuously at work according to Bayer Life Values.
acf3f23c-8508-41bf-97e0-3a6b7c9e0d02.name: Efficiency

badge_template_activities.title: Be accountable: ◆ Assumes end-to-end ownership to achieve results even under tough circumstances. ◆ Pursues everything with a sense of urgency and the commitment to finish. ◆ Confronts difficult situations without avoidance, embraces decision making and is answerable for own actions.

Be lean and fast: ◆ Makes sense of and simplifies complex information providing clarity for others to get the job done. ◆ Achieves appropriate stakeholder input eliminating bureaucracy ensuring fast decision making and implementation. ◆ Acts in a speedy and pragmatic manner, adapts quickly to changing environments, without sacrificing quality and long term goals.

Be courageous and empower others: ◆ Creates an environment safe to challenge the status quo. ◆ Takes risks and makes decisions for the sake of the organization. ◆ Pushes authority and decision making closest to where the work gets done.

7b451aed-4bb1-4fc8-b242-db295201c041.description: The earner of this badge has been nominated by peers in Crop Science Finance Latam and recognized for his/her strong contribution which has been exhibited continuously at work during this year 2020.
7b451aed-4bb1-4fc8-b242-db295201c041.name: CS Finance Awards Latam 2020

Create an environment of trust and collaboration.

Maintains a positive attitude and knows how to transmit it to other collaborators, helping to achieve objectives in adverse situations. Face difficult situations with optimism and confidence.

11fbd7e5-18df-49f1-81bf-a09ae5d0fa0f.description: The earner of this badge has been nominated by peers in Crop Science Finance and recognized for his/her leadership which has been exhibited continuously at work according to Bayer Life Values.
11fbd7e5-18df-49f1-81bf-a09ae5d0fa0f.name: Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: Play to win: ◆ Relentlessly focuses on winning as a team, strives to be #1 in the market and understands what success looks like in each area. ◆ Is highly committed, determined and results-driven and persists in the face of challenges and setbacks. ◆ Promotes a sense of urgency and individual accountability in the team.

Lead with purpose: ◆ Creates and communicates a compelling vision and purpose that motivates others to action. ◆ Sets ambitious goals, has high standards and places team goals ahead of own goals. ◆ Considers the broader impact of own actions.

Grow yourself and others: ◆ Makes it a priority to actively and continuously learn and be future ready. ◆ Seeks and provides feedback. Is self-aware and learns from others. ◆ Takes deliberate action to build the pipeline of ready talent for the future.

0d40755a-a7aa-4712-bca2-818f88964ca2.description: The earner of this badge has been nominated by peers in Crop Science Finance and recognized for his/her flexibility which has been exhibited continuously at work according to Bayer Life Values.
0d40755a-a7aa-4712-bca2-818f88964ca2.name: Flexibility

badge_template_activities.title: Create value with the customer: ◆ Anticipates and has clarity around customer needs taking into account the big picture and thinking strategically. ◆ Co-creates customer-centric solutions driving innovation. ◆ Maintains open communication with customers and builds sustainable relationships.

Innovate and experiment: ◆ Constantly seeks improvement and creates an environment that encourages new ideas. ◆ Tries new ideas and practices new ways of working. ◆ Delivers solutions through iteration and learning from failures.

Go digital: ◆ Uses Data Analytics and other digital tools to provide insights to support better decision making. ◆ Seeks opportunities to leverage Data and Technology to deliver performance improvements. ◆ Constantly seeks opportunities to increase the digital acumen and promote the business narrative to advance the digital transformation.

76fb8a0a-b89d-4110-be27-b8c708ca049a.description: The earner of this badge has been nominated by peers in Crop Science Finance and recognized for his/her integrity which has been exhibited continuously at work according to Bayer Life Values.
76fb8a0a-b89d-4110-be27-b8c708ca049a.name: Integrity

badge_template_activities.title: Act sustainably and be a role model: ◆ Balances growth with ecological and social responsibility. ◆ Is consistent with words and actions. ◆ Personifies the values of the company both internally and externally.

Build trust and be inclusive: ◆ Shares authority, power and credit. ◆ Creates an environment where new ideas and different opinions are welcome. ◆ Treating each other with transparency, fairness and respect.

Collaborate and connect: ◆ Builds partnerships internally and externally. ◆ Leverages expertise and talents across functions and divisions. ◆ Collaborates end to end and removes barriers that separate.

skills.name: Act Sustainably And Be A Role Model
